tp.pr5

Class Main

  • java.lang.Object
    • tp.pr5.Main

  • public class Main
extends java.lang.Object
    Control simulator of a robot, called WALL·E, who have to travel through a city.
    Its mission is recollect the greatest amount of material for recycling. But be careful! WALL·E has a limited amount of power and It has to reach its spaceship before he lose all power. When WALL·E arrives at the place which is the spaceship, WALL·E will disconnect and the simulator will have finished.
    Since:
    February 2013
    Version:
    4.1 Basic version with undo and little tunings.
    Differences with other versions:
    1. All those the statement requires.
    2. Pictures added to JDialog when WALL·E dies, reach spaceship or user request quit
    3. Log is update in each instruction
    4. Perform undo instruction, remembering only the last instruction and performing redo when you undo twice
    Author:
    Abel Serrano Juste
